Source code for grab.util.metrics

from __future__ import annotations


[docs]KB = 1000


[docs]MB = 1000 * KB


[docs]GB = MB * 1000




[docs]def in_unit(num: int, unit: str) -> int | float:
    if unit == "b":
        return num
    if unit == "kb":
        return round(num / float(KB), 2)
    if unit == "mb":
        return round(num / float(MB), 2)
    if unit == "gb":
        return round(num / float(GB), 2)
    return num




[docs]def format_traffic_value(num: int) -> str:
    if num < KB:
        return "%s B" % in_unit(num, "b")
    if num < MB:
        return "%s KB" % in_unit(num, "kb")
    if num < GB:
        return "%s MB" % in_unit(num, "mb")
    return "%s GB" % in_unit(num, "gb")
